revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Shoal Cave |image = [[File:Shoal Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Shoal Cave. |tokens = 30,000 |location = On Route 125, north of Mossdeep City. }} '''Shoal Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 490,000 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages ===

1,900,000 || colspan=3|
N/A |- |}
==Objets== ===Sans Perte de Bonus===

Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || 2 || 52.07% || 50.63% || 44.44% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 26.03% || 25.32% || 22.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || N/A || 20.85% || 22.14% || 27.72% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || 2 || 0.52% || 0.84% || 2.22% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.26% || 0.42% || 1.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.12% || 0.59% |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.12% || 0.59% |}
===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || 2 || 50.45% || 50.45% || 50.45% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 25.23% || 25.23% || 25.23% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Ochre Shard}} || N/A || 24.22% || 24.22% || 24.22% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Icicle Plate}} || 2 || 0.05% || 0.05% || 0.05% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.03% || 0.03% || 0.03% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Heart Scale}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |}
